name: Die Bücher Luzifers 2
storyline:
After the events of Die Bücher Luzifers, Lucifer's army return trying to conquer the world.
New York police man Kyle is visting the library off duty, to aquire a book they've been looking for, as another person in the same building is getting murdered by some mysterious man. As he investigates the murder, he seems to find out about some cult and the horror begins anew. Demons appear all around the city and it is up to Kyle to find out how to stop them.
summary:
Die Bücher Luzifers 2 is the sequel to Kelven's Die Bücher Luzifers.
The player is once again tasked to find the origin of all the demonic chaos happening, this time in New York City. The gameplay stays close to it's predecessor while improving the graphics and letting the battles themselve take place in the actual environment, instead of a special arena for each fight.

Unfortunately the game was cancelled after it's demo release in 2003.
